            {
                color:                  #000;
            }

            {
                text-transform:         uppercase;
                font-weight:            bold;
            }

            ul > li
            {
                line-height:            1.5em;
            }

            hr
            {
                border-style:           solid;
                border-top:             0;
            }

            .logotype {
                display:                block;
                width:                  5em;
                height:                 5em;
                background:             #000;
                display:                flex;
                align-items:            center;
                text-align:             center;
                float:                  left;
                margin-right:           1.5em;
            }

            .logotype__image
            {
                display:                block;
                margin:                 0 auto;
                width:                  70%;
            }

            p:not(.target)
            {
                max-width:              370px;
                line-height:            1.5em;
            }

            .target
            {
                text-align:             left;
                background:             #FFF;
                box-shadow:             3px 3px 0px #ccc;
                position:               relative;
                display:                inline-block;
                margin:                 1em 0 2em;
            }

            .styla-widget__target-tiles--square
            {
                height:                 22.5vw;
                width:                  90vw;
                min-width:              16em;
                min-height:             16em;
            }

            .styla-widget__target-tiles--portrait,
            .styla-widget__target-tiles--horizontal
            {
                height:                 20em;

    <body>
        <div class="logotype">
            <img src="logotype.svg" class="logotype__image">
        </div>
        <h1>Widgets</h1>
        <br>
        <p>In order to guide visitors to your magazine, you can include a widget (or more) on any page on your website. You can find a number of example widgets below.</p>
        <h3>Style it according to your needs</h3>
        <p>If you are interested in using a widget on your site, <br>we will gladly help you with adapting the widget <br>to meet your needs. Please contact your Styla account manager for more information on our widgets.</p>
        <p><a href="#list">List</a> <a href="#horizontal">Horizontal</a> <a href="#tiles">Tiles</a> <a href="#cards">Cards</a></p>
        <hr>

        <a name="list"></a>
        <h2>e.g. the List</h2>
        <p>
            Classy, clean and compatible. The List features stories in a vertically positioned format.
        </p>
        <ul>
            <li>Images keep their original ratio</li>
            <li>Vertical layout</li>
            <li>Adapts your content to the space it's given</li>
            <li>Widths between 250 and 600 pixels</li>
        </ul>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-list--slim"></div>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-list--wide"></div>
        <hr>

        <a name="horizontal"></a>
        <h2 name="horizontal">e.g. the Horizontal</h2>
        <p>
            An alternative take on The List, features the same visually stunning layouts â€“ now positioned horizontally.
        </p>
        <ul>
            <li>Images keep their original ratio</li>
            <li>Horizontal layout</li>
            <li>Fixed height</li>
        </ul>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-horizontal"></div>
        <hr>

        <a name="tiles"></a>
        <h2>e.g. the Tiles</h2>
        <p>
            Let this modern layout strike you not only with its looks, but also
            its versatility. It's the perfect alternative for giving your visual
            content the attention it deserves.
        </p>
        <ul>
            <li>Images are cropped to fill the space</li>
        </ul>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-tiles--square"></div>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-tiles--portrait"></div>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-tiles--horizontal"></div>
        <hr>

        <a name="cards"></a>
        <h2>e.g. the Cards</h2>
        <p>
            The Cards is a simple layout that's easy on the eyes. Its toned down
            aesthetic leaves room for your content to do the talking, and it blends
            well on a large variety of websites.
        </p>
        <ul>
            <li>Images are cropped to fill the space</li>
        </ul>
        <div class="target styla-widget__target-cards"></div>

        <br>

    <script>
        new StylaWidget_Tiles( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'consulting-beauty',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-tiles--square',
            limit   : 4
        } );

        new StylaWidget_Tiles( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'styla-menfashion',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-tiles--portrait',
            limit   : 8
        } );

        new StylaWidget_Tiles( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'styla-womenfashion',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-tiles--horizontal',
            limit   : 3
        } );

        new StylaWidget_List( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'styla-homedecor',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-list--slim',
            limit   : 4
        } );

        new StylaWidget_List( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'styla-beauty',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-list--wide',
            limit   : 4
        } );

        new StylaWidget_Horizontal( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'styla-menfashion',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-horizontal',
            limit   : 4
        } );

        new StylaWidget_Cards( {
            newTab  : true,
            slug    : 'booksandpaper',
            target  : '.styla-widget__target-cards',
            limit   : 4
        } );
    </script>
